dmca.title: Case ID 131919544 - Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: MediaSentry Copyright Infringement [mailto:copyright2@mediasentry.com]

Sent: Wednesday, February 22, 2006 4:12 AM
To: George Poletes
Subject: Case ID 131919544 - Notice of Claimed Infringement

Wednesday, February 22, 2006


ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207  US


RE:  Unauthorized Distribution of the Copyrighted Content: Star Wars: Empire
at War


Dear George Poletes:

We are writing this letter on behalf of LucasArts. 

As you may know, LucasArts is the owner of copyright, trademark, patent and
other intellectual property rights and interests in and to the following:
Star Wars: Empire at War.

No one is authorized to perform, exhibit, reproduce, transmit, or otherwise
distribute the above-mentioned work without the express written permission
of LucasArts, which LucasArts has not granted to 67.19.151.226.

We have received information that an individual has utilized the
above-referenced IP address at the noted date and time to offer downloads of
the above-mentioned work.

The attached documentation specifies the location on your network where the
infringement occurred as well as any available identifying information.

You are thus not only causing LucasArts loss of substantial revenue but are
also indulging in acts of commission and omission warranting criminal and
civil action under the laws of countries who are signatory to WTO
conventions.  

We request that you immediately do the following:

1) Disable access to the individual who has engaged in the conduct described
above; and
2) Terminate any and all accounts that this individual has through you.

By copy of this letter, the owner of the above-referenced Internet site
and/or email account is hereby directed to cease and desist from the conduct
complained of herein.

Please contact us by replying to this email should you have any questions.

We appreciate your assistance and thank you for your cooperation in this
matter.  In your future correspondence with us, please refer to Case ID
131919544.

Your prompt response is requested.

Respectfully

Marianne Henderson
Enforcement Coordinator
SafeNet, Inc.



------------------------------
Infringement Detail:
Infringing Work: Star Wars: Empire at War
Filename: Star.Wars.Empire.At.War.CloneDVD-MiRROR.tar
First Found: 21 Feb 2006 22:13:34 EST (GMT -0500) Last Found: 21 Feb 2006
22:13:34 EST (GMT -0500)
Filesize: 2,097,152k
IP Address: 67.19.151.226
IP Port: 3633
Network: Rizon
Protocol: IRC
Username: carnivores-bt-officespace0
